author: Fitz
post_text: October 18, 2016 at 12:02 AM#1Hello, I have a macro that pulls all output of the console back into the programmer (fixture thru at fixture thru)What would the syntax be if I just wanted to pull specific attributes (from running cues) back into the programmer? For example dimmer values or position values?Thanks

posts.author: Fitz
posts.post_text: October 18, 2016 at 12:02 AM#1Hello, I have a macro that pulls all output of the console back into the programmer (fixture thru at fixture thru)What would the syntax be if I just wanted to pull specific attributes (from running cues) back into the programmer? For example dimmer values or position values?Thanks

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: October 18, 2016 at 9:29 AM#2append a filtering IF syntax at the end:e.g.CodeFixture Thru At Fixture Thru If Attribute "Dim"Fixture Thru At Fixture Thru If PresetType "Position"

title: Macro question: pulling values into programmer
